column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I really do love this place
column2: I've been so many times. It is a cute spot
column5: so many flavor options. Bacon wrapped dates
column6: the goat cheese and tomato sauce
column7: curried chicken salad and the ham and cheese croquettess are my favs. That chicken salad is seriously awesome. Plus with Lettuce Entertain you
column8: you always know you will have a great experience. My family also hosted my baby shower here! It was so nice. We had our own private room with exposed brick walls and tons of space. The service was excellent! Always find myself coming back again and again:)
